actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To authorize appropriations for law enforcement task forces consisting of appropriate Federal, State, and local personnel.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to provide for the enforcement of drug paraphernalia provisions of the Crime Control Act of 1990 through the use of law enforcement task forces consisting of appropriate Federal, State, and local personnel. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize appropriations for law enforcement task forces consisting of appropriate Federal, State, and local personnel.
